mapper.select: select a.id,a.carCode,a.bookCode,b.bookName,b.price,a.userCode,a.number,a.shopCode,a.shopName,a.createAt,a.updateAt,b.exist from (select id,carCode,bookCode,userCode,number,shopCode,shopName,createAt,updateAt from car where userCode = #{userCode} and exist = 1) a LEFT JOIN (select bookCode,bookName,price,exist from book) b on a.bookCode = b.bookCode
select distinct bookCode from car where userCode = #{userCode};
select * from car where bookCode = #{bookCode} and exist = 1;
mapper.update: update car set number = (number + #{number}) where carCode = #{carCode};
